author: rjung
msg: There are so many trunks and this is about
where the Java classes come from
- Move internal variable initialization below setting
variables that might need adjustment (config type)
- Add new flag "-f" to force build, even if externals
- also allow to build from branch (-ver=1.1.x) and
Artefacts will be named accordingly. Only a build
from a tag gets the version number in the file names.
- fix indentation, add some line breaks.
